Description: Red-brown pottery ostracon, comprising many fragments now joined, from the body of a large thick-walled vessel, interior slightly grooved, with remains of eleven lines of thickly black-painted demotic text on the exterior.
Bibliographic references: Kaplony-Heckel 1963a / Die demotischen Tempeleide I: Text (p.94-6)
Kaplony-Heckel 1963b / Die demotischen Tempeleide II: Abbildungen (p.37)
Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (43824) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/43824)
Condition: fair (many fragments now joined, text faded in places)
Acquisition name: Purchased through: R J Moss & Co
